Header.title: Glass Planets
Header.paragraph: Gifts are showering down across the universe. What will land on your planet?

About.paragraph: NAME is a universe where mysterious meteors are known to travel through the universe, crashing into a planet and with it the treasures it holds. A stake to a NAME planet means being able to join in on the mysterious gifts that seem to be crashing down. Once a week, a meteor crashes onto a NAME planet. The owner of said planet takes the spoils. What's in the meteors? Some say its its merch, some say its NFTs, and there is a rumour that sometimes even Ether has been found.

Services.name: 100 Planets Claimed
Services.text: A mysterious meteor carrying treasure crash lands on a planet. The first giveaway for the early explorers of the new frontier.

Services.name: 10% Planets Claimed
Services.text: An extra planet has been claimed but the explorer then fell into a black hole. The first NAME NFT giveaway commences.

Services.name: 25% Planets Claimed
Services.text: Another mysterious meteor, even bigger than before is seen hurling through he galaxy. What planet will it land on this time?

Services.name: 50% Planets Claimed
Services.text: NAME merch design and production begins (Big things to come).

Services.name: 75% Planets Claimed
Services.text: Holy smokes, almost all the planets in the universe have been explored and claimed. Now there are rumers that a large crack has appeared in the galaxy.Â

Services.name: 100% Planets Claimed
Services.text: A big crack in the universe has shot out an obscenely large meteor. No meteor this big has been seen before, now all one can wonder is, "How much treasure is inside?

Features.title: Step 1
Features.text: Lay a stake to (mint) a newly discovered planet in the NAME galaxy

Features.title: Step 2
Features.text: Participate in universe wide events to stake more planets

Features.title: Step 3
Features.text: Simply hold your planet and wait for the mysterious commets to appear.

Features.title: Step 4
Features.text: If the commet crashes onto your planet, you keep the prize!
